Klasse Log

java.lang.Object
de.ehealth.evek.api.util.Log
public class Log extends Object
Class to be used to Log information to a file
Autor:
ricow

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    static void
    initLogging()
    Method to initialize the Logger; creates a file at the given path, if writing´to files is active; File named by current time
    static String
    logPrefix()
    Method to get the Prefix of a Log line, including: Current Threadname Current Threadid
    static void
    sendException(Throwable e)
    Method to Log a message; Only for Exceptions
    static void
    sendMessage()
    Method to Log a empty message; Gets written in Logfile
    static void
    sendMessage(String message)
    Method to Log a message; Gets written in Logfile and printed as Debug-message
    static void
    setPath(String path)
    Method to set the Path the Logfiles are written to
    static void
    setWriteToFile(boolean setWriteToFile)
    Method to set the Logs being written to a file

    • Log

      public Log()

  • Methodendetails

    • initLogging

      public static void initLogging()
      Method to initialize the Logger; creates a file at the given path, if writing´to files is active; File named by current time

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(String message)
      Method to Log a message; Gets written in Logfile and printed as Debug-message
      Parameter:
      message - - the message to print as Log

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage()
      Method to Log a empty message; Gets written in Logfile

    • sendException

      public static void sendException(Throwable e)
      Method to Log a message; Only for Exceptions
      Parameter:
      e - - the Exception to be printed

    • setWriteToFile

      public static void setWriteToFile(boolean setWriteToFile)
      Method to set the Logs being written to a file
      Parameter:
      setWriteToFile - - boolean to set, if logs are written to files

    • setPath

      public static void setPath(String path)
      Method to set the Path the Logfiles are written to
      Parameter:
      path - - the path, the Logfiles are written to

    • logPrefix

      public static String logPrefix()
      Method to get the Prefix of a Log line, including: Current Threadname Current Threadid
      Gibt zurück:
      String - the formatted Log Prefix
